definitions.definition: One of the poles used to hold up a tent .
A large-scale entertainment production that is a major source of revenue for its studio , television network , or investors .
definitions.label_groups: US , attributive , figurative , film , television , theater

main_definition: One of the poles used to hold up a tent .
secondary_definitions: ( US , attributive , figurative , film , television , theater ) A large-scale entertainment production that is a major source of revenue for its studio , television network , or investors .
